Name: Interstellar_b12
Description: REQUIRES CD2_beta_12b, MEVv5_4 AND DEA_a05t2. Interstellar, shortened as IS, is a spin off of FC_b23 with some interesting twists on modded enemies. b12 Changelogs: Added Big Shredder brought back from FC in here. Shredders: Rarity 5.5 -> 6.25 to make up with Big Shredder existing along side. Solaris: Added x1 StaggerImmunityWindow. Elite Slasher: Removed weaknesses from elemental and physical damage. Patrol Bot: Freeze temp 175 -> 150 for Cryo Nade breakpoint. Removed Harvesters and Cave Angels from WaveSpawners, keeping only Fire Maggots for FPS improvement. MaxActiveCritters reduced from 1000 -> 240. PentaJaw wave spawner Interval 100 -> 120s.

ED_Spider_ExploderTank_small_frozen.DisplayName: Glyphid Mini-Ice Detonator (unused because can't make silent)

ED_Spider_RapidShooter_Kamikaze.DisplayName: Glyphid Kamikaze Menace (Removed from the pool previously)
